info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 1:05AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jo Daviess and Stephenson Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 103 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rock City to near St. Donatus. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds 30 to 40 mph. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with some areas receiving an inch or more in less than an hour. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Freeport, Galena, Lena, Stockton, Warren, Hanover, Pearl City, Elizabeth, Cedarville, Davis, Woodbine, Dakota, Scales Mound, Apple River, Winslow, Rock City, Ridott, Council Hill, Nora and Schapville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
